xtc.lang.cpp

Class MacroTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • xtc.lang.cpp.MacroTable

  • public class MacroTable
extends Object
    The conditional macro table. A few properties: (1) no entry means the macro is free, (2) the union of all entry's conditions is TRUE, (3) each entry's definitions' conditions are disjoint, (4) there is at most one free and one undefined element (5) the table is optimized by having no duplicate definitions
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.61 $

    • Method Detail

      • define

        public void define(String name,
          MacroTable.Macro macro,
          xtc.lang.cpp.PresenceConditionManager presenceConditionManager)
        Define a macro under a given presenceCondition. This function will ensure that all conditions are disjoint and that there are no more than one of each unique definition.

      • _define

        protected void _define(String name,
           MacroTable.Macro macro,
           xtc.lang.cpp.PresenceConditionManager.PresenceCondition presenceCondition)
        Update the symbol table with a new entry. The presenceCondition passed will gain a reference, so dereference it yourself if you no longer need it.

      • rectifyGuard

        public void rectifyGuard(String guardMacro,
                xtc.lang.cpp.PresenceConditionManager presenceConditionManager)
        Update the presenceConditions of macros that use a guard macro. We assume that guard macros for headers are undefined, not free. This method assumes that there is no entry in the macro table for the guard macro. Since it is only called by HeaderFileManager.openHeader right now, that method checks this condition.
        Parameters:
        guardMacro - The name of the guard macro.
        presenceConditionManager - The presenceCondition manager.

      • undefine

        public void undefine(String name,
            xtc.lang.cpp.PresenceConditionManager presenceConditionManager)
        Undefine a macro under the given presenceCondition.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the macro to undefine.
        presenceConditionManager - The presenceCondition manager holding the current presence condition in which the macro should be undefined.

      • get

        public List<MacroTable.Entry> get(String name,
                         xtc.lang.cpp.PresenceConditionManager presenceConditionManager)
        Gets the macro table entries of the given macro under the given presenceCondition. Any entries not valid in the presenceCondition will not be returned. This creates new Entry objects for the entries with the presence conditions ANDed with the current presence condition.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the macro.
        presenceConditionManager - The manager containing the current presence condition.
        Returns:
        The list of entries valid under the current presence condition or null if there are none.

      • free

        public void free(List<MacroTable.Entry> entries)

      • countDefinitions

        public int countDefinitions(String name)
        Count the number of definitions a given macro has. Does not include FREE or UNDEFINED entries in the macro table.
        Parameters:
        name - The macro name.
        Returns:
        The number of definitions of the macro.
